recipe.title: Cilantro-Lime Chicken And Rice Bowl Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¾ cup ; brown rice, cooked ; (195 g)
½ cup ; rotisserie chicken, shredded ; (60 g)
¼ cup ; pico de gallo ; (45 g)

steps.step: Place the brown rice, shredded chicken, roasted vegetables, pico de gallo, and yogurt in a bowl or resealable container. Garnish with chopped cilantro and the lime wedge.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Place the brown rice, shredded chicken, roasted vegetables, pico de gallo, and yogurt in a bowl or resealable container.
Garnish with chopped cilantro and the lime wedge.
